comments.body: We should probably only take the basename of the executable, and not the whole path.

I checked, `executable` is just `cd` or `unzip` or whatever, it's not to a path.
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/52437
```
ProcessException: The command failed
Command: unzip -o -q /Users/sagidamti/flutter/bin/cache/downloads/storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra/flutter/c4229bfbbae455ad69c967be19aee3fadd6486e1/sky_engine.zip -d /Users/sagidamti/flutter/bin/cache/pkg
```
Is generated from
```
"ProcessException: $msg\n  Command: $executable $args";
```
Do you know if the tool touches any files whose name isn't under tool control? If not, we can retain the basename of the path.
Could be the project directory with the app name.  Hopefully the stacktrace will give us enough info to know what was happening.
